trans-unit.source: Specifies the behavior of the object context when the <see cref="M:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges(System.Data.Objects.SaveOptions)" /> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o comportamento do contexto de objeto quando o método <see cref="M:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges(System.Data.Objects.SaveOptions)" /> é chamado.

trans-unit.source: After changes are saved, the <see cref="M:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.AcceptAllChangesAfterSave" /> method is called, which resets change tracking in the <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager" />.
trans-unit.target: Depois que as alterações forem salvas, o método <see cref="M:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.AcceptAllChangesAfterSave" /> será chamado, o que redefinirá o controle de alterações no <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager" />.

trans-unit.source: Before changes are saved, the <see cref="M:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.DetectChanges" /> method is called to synchronize the property values of objects that are attached to the object context with data in the <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager" />.
trans-unit.target: Antes de salvar as alterações, o método <see cref="M:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.DetectChanges" /> é chamado para sincronizar os valores de propriedade dos objetos que estão anexados ao contexto de objeto com os dados no <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager" />.

trans-unit.source: Changes are saved without the <see cref="M:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.DetectChanges" /> or the <see cref="M:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.AcceptAllChangesAfterSave" /> methods being called.
trans-unit.target: As alterações são salvas sem chamar os métodos <see cref="M:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.DetectChanges" /> ou <see cref="M:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.AcceptAllChangesAfterSave" />.
